Coat rack as a plant stand: Use the hooks on the coat rack to hang small plants or herbs, turning it into a space-saving and visually appealing plant stand.
Coat rack as a storage rack: Utilize the coat rack to store items like baskets, bags, or other small objects, keeping them organized and out of the way.
Coat rack as a pegboard: Attach pegs or pegboards to the coat rack and use them to hang tools, keys, or other small items, creating a makeshift pegboard.
Coat rack as a shoe rack: Attach small hooks or pegs to the coat rack to hang shoes, keeping them organized and off the floor.
Coat rack as a wine rack: Use the hooks on the coat rack to hang wine bottles or glasses, creating a unique and functional wine rack.
